summary: THE CAR SUDDENLY SHUT OFF WHILE DRIVING ON THE HIGHWAY.  IT DID NOT RESTART RIGHT AWAY.  AFTER TRYING SEVERAL TIMES THE CAR STARTED.  ALSO, IT WOULD SLOW DOWN WHILE DRIVING UP HILL UNTIL THE CAR STOPPED.  AFTER WAITING SEVERAL MINUTES AND FLOORING THE GAS PETAL THE CAR CONTINUED FORWARD.  MY SAFETY CONCERN IS THE CAR SUDDENLY SHUTTING DOWN WHILE DRIVING ON A HIGHWAY.  THE CAR WAS CHECKED OUT BY A MECHANIC TODAY, HE SAID THE TRANSMISSION NEEDS TO BE REPLACED.
